metadata.dc:author: Monge-Argiles, J A
Leiva-Santana, C
Palao-Sánchez, A
metadata.dc:description: We have realized the test of cold in a group of patients with ischemic cerebrovascular attack (AVCi) and in a control group. The comparison of results shows a different vascular reactivity into the groups. At present, it is unknown if there is a relation of this finding with the AVCi occurrence.
metadata.dc:title: Respuesta al test del frío en pacientes mayores de sesenta años con enfermedad cerebrovascular isquémica.
[Response to the cold test in patients older than 60 years of age with ischemic cerebrovascular disease].
